title: Episode #83: Why we need to argue more, the mental health benefits of arguing + tips to argue correctly and resolve issues fast
description:
Did you know arguing can actually be good for your mental health? In this episode I discuss how arguing can improve your mental health, how to correctly argue, how to resolve issues fast, and how to stop arguing over the same problem over and over again.
